title: LF Bronze - Platinum players for AGC Ranked Teams!

embed.description: Step up your game with a modern voice & text chat app. Crystal clear voice, multiple server and channel support, mobile apps, and more. Get your free server now!

body:
Hi there! 

My name is Huskey and I represent a discord based gaming community called AGC with a heavy emphasis on League of Legends. I am writing this post to inform you that we are recruiting for our ranked teams program! Complete this signup form to get involved! https://goo.gl/forms/FmyhsYgVmbHcasku1

Our ranked teams will have access to coaching and analysis (meaning if you're a coach we have a place for you too) as well as a structured environment to play with a five player flex team and make new friends! 

Thanks so much for reading, 
Huskey - Ranked Team Coordinator for AGC
